title: Ways to feed the growing human population

content.question: At the current rate of growth, Earth's human population will double in about 50 years. Which of the following is the LEAST viable strategy for ensuring adequate nutrition for a population of this size?

choices.label: Increasing the number of new food crops from the great diversity of plant species
Doubling the area of arable land on a global basis
Developing systems for making the global distribution of food more equitable
Increasing the area of land that is currently dedicated to grain production by reducing the area dedicated to meat production
Assisting developing countries in using highly efficient crop irrigation systems

content.answer: Doubling the area of arable land on a global basis

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Describe disadvantages, advantages, or unintended consequences for potential solutions.
